channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- PC Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- PC Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-3772|2024-08-01T15:04:36.566Z -- lenovo -- pc%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PC Manager versions prior to 2.6.40.3154 that could allow an attacker to cause a system reboot.

item.title: CVE-2019-6197|2024-07-31T21:00:05.134Z -- lenovo -- pc%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability was reported in Lenovo PC Manager prior to version 2.8.90.11211 that could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges.
